org.apache.flink.api.java.io

类 PrimitiveInputFormat<OT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileInputFormat<OT>
        • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
          • org.apache.flink.api.java.io.PrimitiveInputFormat<OT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>, InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>, InputSplitSource<FileInputSplit>

    @PublicEvolving
public class PrimitiveInputFormat<OT>
extends DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
    An input format that reads single field primitive data from a given file. The difference between this and CsvInputFormat is that it won't go through Tuple1.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open(FileInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        Opens the given input split. This method opens the input stream to the specified file, allocates read buffers and positions the stream at the correct position, making sure that any partial record at the beginning is skipped.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
        参数:
        split - The input split to open.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.
        另请参阅:
        FileInputFormat.open(org.apache.flink.core.fs.FileInputSplit)

      • readRecord

        public OT readRecord(OT reuse,
                     byte[] bytes,
                     int offset,
                     int numBytes)
              throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        This function parses the given byte array which represents a serialized record. The function returns a valid record or throws an IOException.
        指定者:
        readRecord 在类中 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
        参数:
        reuse - An optionally reusable object.
        bytes - Binary data of serialized records.
        offset - The offset where to start to read the record data.
        numBytes - The number of bytes that can be read starting at the offset position.
        返回:
        Returns the read record if it was successfully deserialized.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the record could not be read.
